OMP-tTA / tetO-Tet3 5hmC/5mC enhancers
========================================================

Make profiles
```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(source("~/src/seqAnalysis/R/profiles2.R"))
makeProfile2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "omp_hmc_120424_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean")
makeProfile2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "ott3_1_hmc_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean")
makeProfile2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "omp_mc_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean")
makeProfile2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "ott3_1_mc_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean")
```

Plot OMP and O/TT3 5hmC
```{r}
plot2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "omp_hmc_120424_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean", cols=1, fname="manual")
```

```{r}
plot2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "ott3_1_hmc_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean", cols=1, fname="manual")
```

Plot OMP and O/TT3 5mC
```{r}
plot2("omp_h3k4me1_default_inter_phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "omp_mc_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean", cols=1, fname="manual")
```

plot2("phastCons30way_intergenic_sorted_merge500_thresh500_inter_omp_h3k4me1_gc_F3.bed_W25F200_both_chr", "ott3_1_mc_rpkm", data_type="rpkm/mean", cols=1, fname="manual")
